# fadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects

**Instance Property**

Configures the grounding shadow’s fade behavior when the entity is near physical objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var fadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects: GroundingShadowComponent.FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects { get set }
```
